111331.content:
As the town's only practicing sorcerer, you are both the most beloved, and the most despised.

You are Ash, a 31 year-old spotted hyena. 6'1" at the ears, well-built and beautifully chubby at 225lbs. You love a body's stink in all it's forms, you dabble in carpentry and wood carving, and you are the latest in a long line of magic users.

You came to the village at the young age of eighteen, almost by accident. Setting out eagerly to travel the world and discover exactly what kind of magic you could truly excel at, you set off to travel the world. In a stroke of luck, just a week after setting out, a broken bike chain forced you to make a pit-stop in the small town. As soon as you set foot onto the main street, the smell and the sights hit you hard. A sense of awe hit you, and your arcane senses lit up with possibilities. In short, you had found your new home.

Years later, you've set up a permanent residence within the town. You've made a business with your new found power of what you can only describe as "manipulation, absorption and expulsion of various bodily fluids", which has earned you great popularity with the local citizens. You have a few enemies, however: so-called "purists" obsessed with keeping stink natural, who had for the longest time focused on pharmaceuticals and supplements, suddenly made you their pubic enemy #1. In spite of them, you've made a very comfortable living for yourself, working on your own time doing various jobs, and working as a street performed when bored.

In short: you're magic, you're very happy with your life, and the town is happy that you're here.

1122.content:
You are a teenage wolf attending the local, and only, high school. The courses are not too rigorous, stemming from the fact the the town basicly gets all its money from tourism and education is really only a formality here, but that's the last thing on your mind. Lately you've been lusting over this lion girl at your school. Every aspect of her is gorgeous, especially her beautiful, smelly ass. You've always watched from afar;however, today is your lucky day.

Cut to the morning, before school starts, and you're walking towards the first class you share with her. You notice she's waiting by the door, and before you can enter the classrooms she catches you by the arm. She says nothing, but gives you a sly smile as she leads you a bit further away from the classroom. As you walk behind her, you're eyes are fixated on her ass, clad only in a very short skirt rendered ineffective by her elevated tail. The tease.

Once about fifty feet from the room, she turns around, and you halt in place. Looking coy, she begins pacing around you.
"So, Isaac, it's come to my attention that you seem to have a crush on me."

"... Yeah. " You say, slightly embarrassed.

She continues walking. " And I've also noticed that you have a particular affinity for my ass, " She says, lifting her tail higher when she walks in front of you.

You blush harder."Yeah."

She stops in front of you, looking you in the eyes. "So, I've got a deal for you. You can sit under my chair today, and huff my asshole all your want, for all classes we have together."

You're heart skips a beat. Four periods of sniffing her amazing, rank ass? There has to be some sort of catch.
"On one condition, though," she continues. "If I make a mess, you have to clean it up."

You nod. At your school, students wet and mess themselves all the time, but there aren't enough janitors to clean everything up. Rather than outlaw soiling, the school just makes students clean up their own mess.

"Basically, in exchange for someone sniffling my butt I get my own toilet," she concludes. She stops pacing again, and looks at you. "What do you say?"

"Yes!" You respond. This is an amazing deal.

She laughs. "Great. If you do well, I might have to make this a regular thing," she remarks as you go back to class. She takes her seat, and you take yours under her. You have your face right behind her, and your legs sprawled forwards, meeting hers. The teacher, of course, couldn't care less, and begins his lesson. Meanwhile, you shove your muzzle up to meet her crusty, smelly, glorious butthole, eliciting a giggle from her. You are in heaven.

You inhale the strong scent as he varies his aim, going up and down your chest and belly. It was incredibly musky, a lot smellier than his feet. He starts traveling down your body, peeing on your legs. The liquid completely soaked through your shorts, trapping the smell in them. Then, as he moved down and started peeing on your feet, you spread your toes as the wolf marked them with his foul smelling urine. The warm liquid felt nice on your feet, almost like a warm bath, except you would need a bath after this was done.

He started going up your body again, marking one of your armpits before doing the same to the other. By now, almost your entire upper body was soaked with the yellow waste. He must have been saving his urine for a long time if he had this much to use. You thought for a moment that he may have saved it all for you. He traveled down your right arm until he reached your hand, taking a few seconds to cover it in pee. As he went to do the same to your other arm and hand, you can feel the wolf’s piss dripping down you and forming a small puddle under you as it seeps into the ground. Anyone who comes by here will definitely know he was here. You feel the urine moving away from you for a second but you can still hear the wolf peeing. You look over to see the wolf now spraying your shirt with his piss, making the fabric a soaked rag for the musky liquid.

"Just making sure I don't miss anything," He said.

Finally, you hold your breath and close your eyes as you anticipate what comes next. He starts traveling up your neck and starts pissing on your head. He soaks your hair and covers your face with his yellow waste. Thankfully, he manages to avoid getting any in your nose so you’re not hacking and coughing to breathe again. After a few seconds, the stream comes to a stop and he takes a sniff of your body, now completely reeking of the stench of wolfman urine.

“Now you’re mine,” He said in a fake serious tone, getting a small chuckle out of it. Going back to his regular tone, he said. “But really, I hope you like the smell ‘cause it’s not gonna come off for at least a couple of weeks.”

“Really?” You ask.

“Yeah, our piss is a rough and tough scent. Not as tough as some creatures, but it’s up there.” He says.

You sit up and take a whiff of your new scent.
1223.title: Mark you with his urine (Strong scent)

12232.content:
"Wow, that stinks!" You say as the scent really hits you. "That is a strong smell."

"Just keep breathing it in. You'll get used to it," He says. As he helps you stand up, you feel more drops of urine running down your body and you are now standing in a large muddy puddle of the yellow waste. You pick up your shirt off of the ground as it drips with more wolf pee. You wring it out and more of the scented yellow fluid falls to the puddle, with your feet soaking in it, before putting the damp, filthy garment back on. "So you ready to go?"

"Yeah, let's go." You agree. He starts walking off and you follow after him. As you keep going, you look around and see (and smell) more of the town's inhabitants. Down another street, you see a brown-feathered bird standing on the roof of a building before pooping right off of it. The white and black mess splatters as it hits the ground, getting on everything around that spot. You see a tiger down another street squatting down over a rat as he farted loudly in his face. It was very loud and you were sure it stank. You also pass by a hyena who reeks heavily of musk. The wolf walking ahead of you probably could tell what kind of musk it was, but you just thought it was a strong body odor. As he passes you, he takes a sniff of you and does a double take afterwards. You thought maybe it was because either he didn't expect to find a human that stank so much or maybe the fact that you reeked of wolf pee was what threw him off. You were paying attention to your own scent as well. It was still strong but you were gradually getting used to it.

Eventually, you and the wolf reached your destination. It was a place filled with a lot of beastfolk walking around and the smell coming from them all was incredibly strong.
12232.title: Sample of the stinky streets

choices: "Let's go get some samples. I am kind of hungry, so they sell food there, too?"
"We might as well head straight in to the main event. You look eager enough.”
122321.content:
As you took a look around, you recognized your destination to be a large marketplace, not too different from any human one. There was food, art, tools, everything you'd expect from a market. However there was one area that caught you off guard, despite being the most obvious choice for a village such as this: an entire sector dedicated to bathrooms, outhouses, latrines, and everything in between.

It was to no one's surprise that this particular section occupied damn half of the marketplace. You almost had to run to keep up with your friend, who was weaving his way through the crowd, and towards a ...ticket booth?

He slapped a wristband on you once you had caught up. "This band lets you try out anything you'd like, so long as you don't break it, or it's a consumable," he explains. "Although, we may be able to work the 'human' aspect a bit to get you a sample of some laxatives or heavy food or something..."

You roll your eyes. "I don't think that'll happen. I mean, I wasn't even planning on seeing all this{,/i}"as you gesture at the crowds of furs lined up, "Let alone participating myself!"

He chuckles, and leads you along. "Come on, live a little! When else will you get the chance to take the biggest crap of your life sitting mere inches from a farting rhino and an elephant with diarrhea, or sit on the bottom of a multi-story outhouse, underneath a bird, a bull, and a gryphon?"

You stare at him. "When would I ever want to?!"

He scoffs at your objection. "I'm sure you'll come around to it. Everyone else here has!" he remarks, referring to the smelly crowd surrounding you.

You sigh internally. You knew the village was going to be bad, but you could never have anticipated it being like this. Still, most of all, you didn't want to disappoint your friend.

You sigh externally this time. "All right, I'll give it a go," you relent. "But I can't promise anything. I'm only ...human, you know," staggered slightly by your unintentionally racist phrasing.

He slaps you on the back. "That's the spirit! Now, do you want to see if we can get a sample of some 'medicines', or do you want to head straight into the action?"
122321.title: An outdoor marketplace

1223212.content:
He wags his tail. "Great! Let's go look at what's available."

He runs ahead, and you jog after him. While he's darting around like a kid in a candy shop, you take some time to reflect on the good in your situation. For example, the ground was much cleaner here! You're entirely sure that it's just because it's just because everyone's saving it for their 'test runs' and, if your friend has his way you're going to be spending more time inside of them than out, but hey! Focus on the positives.

He seems to have settled on one to begin with, and he excitedly pitches you it once you finally reach him.

"I found this really cool one!" he exclaims. "It's a double, and it's got one guy sitting behind the other, right? But the second one is dropped down a few feet and pushed forward so their butt is like an inch away from your face! It's awesome!" He's hopping from foot to foot in anticipation.

You mull it over in your head.
1223212.title: ”We might as well head straight in to the main..."

choices: You finish up in time, and make it out.
You're too slow: you're in there for another person.
12232121.content:
As you both get in line, you pick up one of the information papers to pass the time. According to the paper, you can buy several units and chain them up indefinitely, or even take out the side walls and install them side-by-side. You can't think of a reason anyone would want to do that, but, whatever.

In just a short while it's your turn. You are selected to be on the receiving end, and with your friend's encouragement you strip your clothes and enter the unit.

You're ready before your partner is, so you take a moment to look around. It's a narrow wooden building with two seats and two corresponding holes. Yours is, indeed, set a few feet below the the other one. Your legs and feet fit into an area located actually underneath the main seat's hole, but luckily for you there is a ramp that deflects their waste away from your lap (the ad boasts that it it removable, but you elect to leave it in for now.

Just then the opposite door opens, and you meet your partner: a very large, burly rhino who looks like he barely even fits . He looks at you for a second, then extends his hand.

"T'names mark", he grumbles, but in a friendly way. "I take it you're gonna be sittin' down there?"

You nod, and hop up onto your seat to shake his hand. "Yep. First time," you reply.

He laughs. "You picked a hell of time for your first time, kid" he remarks, slapping a hand on his swollen stomach. His tail flips up as he lets out a short fart, and he chuckles again. "I'm about as full as I've ever been."

He turns around to sit down, and in the process he reveals his massive asshole to you: it's easily as large as your fist. You sit down on your seat, and as fate would have it, you end up with your face perfectly centered with his tailhole. It's not two inches from your face, and it smells terrible; you can tell it hasn't been washed in ages.

You hear a gurgle from Mark's belly, and his tail raises from it's resting position atop your head. "Y'ready, kid?" he calls out.

You swallow in nervousness. "As I'll ever be," you reply.

He doesn't bother to respond. Before your eyes you see his tailhole open, and he farts heavily into your face. The smell is an order of magnitude worse than anything else you've smelled in the village. He wastes no time in letting out another low fart, so strong you can feel the wind blowing against your face. You scrunch up your face and try to lean back, only to hit the door right behind you. He follows up with a third and a forth fart, getting progressively wetter. His fifth fart is a disgusting, sputtering mess, and his sixth, final fart is so wet that it actually manages to scatter a film of some sort of anal liquid all over your face.

Having apparently expended his gas, Mark shifts around a bit in his seat. "I hope you're ready for this, Kid..." he mumbles to you. You hope you're ready, too, but you doubt it.

His tail hole begins to expand again, but much slower than before. You look on, and you are greeted with a large, brownish-green mass of rhino dung. Mark sighs as it begins pushing it's way out of his ass, and dropping down into the hole. Your nose is much closer to it than you'd ever have wanted, and it smells AWFUL. The flow is interrupted by a wet, sputtering, smelly fart, and just as quickly it resumes, dropping to the bottom of the outhouse with a steady plop plop plop.

After about a twenty seconds of this his flow weakens, and then dies completely. He wiggles his hindquarters once and lets out one more rank fart into your face, and then gets up. His hole and the underside of his tail are smeared with rhino crap, but he ignores the toilet paper.

"Well, kid," he says to you without turning around, "I hope you enjoyed that as much as I did". He chuckles again as he walks out the door, into the light.

You just sit there, sill in shock, until you remember: you sill had to go to the bathroom! If you didn't go now, your friend would inevitably make you go somewhere else. Panicked, you begin doing your business
12232121.title: "Let's go with that one, then."

choices: You follow the young foxess home, leaving your friend and your chance to shit.
You refuse her offer, you decided that your business comes first.
122321212.content:
You didn't even have time to start with your business, because someone walked in right after the rhino left. It was a young female fox. Her beautyful hair flowed freely and you almost started to drool when you saw her godlike behind. Although you just got disgusted when you realised how dirty it was. You had to admit that you were getting used to the smell atleast a bit.
"A human? Here?" The fox said questionably.
"Yeah... I have a friend who lives here." You said, blushing while doing so.
"Well, I almost feel bad doing this to you, but it's too late." The canine animal said before letting out a fart, almost making you choke on the foul air.
The foxess proceeded to let out several farts, each one being much more worse than the previous fart. Some of the farts even splattering some manure on your relatively clean face, if you compare to the rest of the people in this smelly village. Your thoughts were interrupted by the fox smacking you on the head with one of her filthy paws.
"Are you daydreaming? You need to be fully focused on my booty and what comes out of it!" The foxess said followed by a chuckle.
You didn't know what to say and you were actually feeling guilty, but your thoughts faded away when the fox's ass opened up, and loose light brown manure started falling down right before your eyes. It smelled horrendous but not unbearable. You started to bend forward a bit to get a taste of the shit. You sticked out your tounge to get a taste of the brown porridge and god did it taste horrible. You gagged from the foul taste but you wanted more for some reason. You wanted to get another taste but the foxess has been looking at you for a long time without you noticing and she finally decided to open her mouth.
"Enjoying yourself, are you? Well, why don't you come back to my place and you can see the full meaning of enjoyment." The foxess said seductively.
She was a complete stranger to you and you didn't even know her name, and you really needed to get on with doing your business, but this offer was hard to refuse.
122321212.title: You're too slow: you're in there for an...

choices: "A hot tub sounds nice, actually. Where is it?"
"How about we look for one more?"
12232122.content:
Your face blanches. "That one seems a little ...intense. Maybe we could pick another one?"

Your friend's smile fades a bit, but he recovers. "Alright. I'll be back in a second, just stay here. You know, in case you change your mind."

With that, he runs off, leaving you to ponder your decision. It's a bit of a gamble, and you're betting on the one he finds being better than this monster of an outbuilding. At least, you hope this is the worst one here; you certainly couldn't imagine anything worse, but you wouldn't put it past this town. Really, the only thing you're sure of right now is that he's going to ignore your request for a less "intense" experience.

In less than a minute he comes running back, another exited grin on his face. "Ok, I found another one for you. It's like a hot tub, but, like, designed for people to go to the bathroom in! There's a long line, but we might be able to get you in front 'cause you're a human, but only if we hurry!"
12232122.title: "I think we should keep looking."

122321222.content:
Repulsed by the idea of bathing in other creatures' waste, you decide to pursue another option, disappointing your friend again., but he comes up with another idea almost instantly. "I know! You remember that multi-story outhouse I mentioned earlier..."

You don't really care for the idea either, but you figure that you could elect to take the outhouse on the top and avoid getting dirty. You fake your amusement, saying, "Sure. Let's go for it!" Your friend quickly lightens up, and motions you to join him.

You reach the outhouse, and, as looks just like your friend told you. You wait in the moderately long line, waiting to give your preference, but find out that whichever level you're placed in is selected randomly. And, just your luck, you wind up on the...
122321222.title: "How about we look for one more?"

choices: Sleep in the hotel down the road, you get a very smelly roommate
Go with the ox to his house, you don’t trust that hungry croc
Decide to go to a bathhouse to clean yourself, the place is pretty dirty
Explore the town and bump into an angry and equally smelly anthro
You need to go to an outhouse, unfortunately you share it with someone
13.content:
You are a young teenage human named Nick and you were walking in the woods today, doing a project for your high school science class. It was pretty lame, you needed to collect pine cones to see what stage of germination they were in and bring them home and record it in your notebook. It was a pretty boring way to spend a Saturday afternoon but you weren’t doing to good in school either and to top it off you’ve been held back a few times. Well today was boring at least until you got completely and utterly lost. You scrambled around the woods for hours terrified you may be permanently lost in these woods until you see and hear something. The sun is starting to set now and you’re starting to panic and freak out but now that you see some lights and hear some voices your fears leave you. You look and see what looks like an average human town with houses, a market place and everything else you’d expect in a town nestled deep in the woods but still a sizable establishment. You quickly run forward towards it also seeing some humanoid figures on the outskirts of the town that seem to be chatting.

You run up to them, “Hey, hey excuse me, I’m lost I need help.” Once the figures come into focus you feel the natural instinct to turn around and run but you’re legs are frozen in fear. In front of you are to towering male anthro animals chatting, one is a crocodile and the other an ox both very fat animals with sagging bellies, man boobs and thick blubbery arms, they also seem to be emitting a disgusting odor. They both turn to look at you, the croc speaks, “Hey there kid, what’s the problem, you lost? Well don’t worry kiddo us beast folk are quite the hospitable type I bet you can find yourself an open hotel room or even get someone to offer you some lodging.” You back away with part of your shirt pulled over your mouth and nose, trying to stop the entry of the malodorous scents, “Um that’s ok I think I’ll get going.” The croc puts a scaly paw on your shoulder, “Oh but I insist, in fact would you like to sleep with me tonight. I mean a chewy tasty human like yourself needs a big croc like me to protect you from predators right.”

The croc then opens his disgusting muzzle breathing out on you what you can only think is poisonous bad breath and his tongue shoots out and licks your face covering you in smelly reptile drool. The tongue retracts back into his stinky maw and his smacks his scaly lips, “Not bad, not bad at all.” You are about to shriek in terror when the ox chuckles and puts a hoof on his reptile friends shoulder, “I’m sorry for my friend here he really means you no harm really, he just likes messing with human but I do invite you to come into town to find a place to sleep. Whether it be with one of us or another resident it’s better and much safer then sleeping out in the woods.” You agree with the ox and the two anthro animals lead you into town where you are safe from any animals of the non-anthro persuasion that may be more hostile towards you. You can’t believe that just a few hours ago you were a regular high school human kid and now you have somehow ended up in a village of anthro animals, how could this even exist you should be in your town right now if the map you had was correct there shouldn’t be a forest here let alone a town filled with anthro animals. The ox and croc tell you they are about to split up to go back to their respective homes for the night. What do you decide to do?
13.title: The Lost Human

choices: ‘My room of course’, you’ll have a smelly night with this stinky fox babe
My friend’s room, he’s a friendly but disgusting dragon
One of the employee’s rooms, a mischievous and putrid ogre girl
131.content:
Before the two anthro animals head off to their respective homes they inform you about a nice hotel down a few blocks. They both highly recommend it and you agree to check it out. Soon enough the two leave and you walk down the street towards the direction the hotel was in. The streets seemed pretty deserted but there were a few anthro residents walking about. Most of them looked at you in surprise and shock. You were walking forward and coming in your direction was a tall and well built griffin. He stared at you with similar shocked eyes and as he got closer and closer to you his unhygienic smell invaded your nostrils. The griffin stops in front of you, not paying attention you bump into him and look in front of you to see you were face to bellybutton with this big birds stomach. He had to be a good three or four heads taller than you.

The griffin craned his short feathery neck to look down at you, “How a human, don’t see to many of your kind around here, where ya headed to little buddy?” This guy seems pretty friendly, “I’m headed to some place called Katie’s Inn.” The griffin chuckles, “Oh well good for you, if you see Katie tell her I said hi and asked her if she got my letter okay.” You agree and the griffin walks off dragging his putrid stench with him, thank god you thought you were about to pass out there for a second. You continue your walk undisturbed and end up in front of a large regal looking building. It had large white pillars around it’s front and elegant window frames, but much like the rest of this town you can tell there was some kind of rank stench emanating from the building.

Maybe this was a bad idea, but then again that ox and croc are probably long gone and you doubt a griffin you randomly met on the street would give you lodging. Building up your inner strength you take a deep breath of half contaminated air and burst through the tall red doors. The hotels interior was just as regal as the exterior but the only person you spot in the main lobby is a lone vixen desk clerk. The busty female fox stood at a good nine feet tall and was sitting at the wooden front desk reading a magazine called ‘Fur and Beauty’, looking bored. You nervously approach the desk and when you are about a foot away the fox hears you and mumbles out, “Welcome to Katie’s Inn how may I- OHHHHH MY, MY, MY, WHAT DO WE HAVE HERE?” The vixens ears perk up as she notices you and her tail starts to wag behind her, “Aren’t you the cutest little human.”

You chuckles nervously and then you hear a loud sputtering fart, you start to retch and gag at the smell that emanates from the desk and you actually see a brownish cloud seep up from under the desk and spread out throughout the room causing you to almost vomit. The vixen fans the air around her, seeming to also be offended by the smell, “Sorry hun, Taco Bell doesn’t agree with me all that well.” They have Taco Bell HERE? You regain your composure and reply, “Ugh it’s fine but I came for a room Ms., ugh…” She responds, “Katie Ferdinand, the hotel owner, I’ll get you a room right away UUUURRRRRRPPPPPP… oops sorry.” She belched loudly in your face allowing you to get a rancid smell of what was left of her dinner. She looks through the book on the front desk, “PPPPRRFFFFTTTT Oh sorry sweetie but we only have one room left.” You ask, “What room?” The vixen responds…
131.title: Unexpected Hotel Guest

choices: The room is a mess and smell just as bad or worse then her farts
The room clean but there still that fart smell of her in it
Sitting on the bed was a female skunk who was dress in yellow gray clothes.
1311.content:
"Not to sound rude mis. Ferdinand but isn't there any other rooms?" I asked as you try not to let out a gagging sound. Her eyes narrow at me and I could hear a small growling coming from her through.

"I may be a bit gassy, but there no need to be rude." She stood up and let out a loud fart that seem to deflate and anger her more if it was even possible.

"No, no that had nothing to do with it. I wouldn't want to inconvenience you and be a intrusion on to your personal safe place." You try to keep you face still as the fart was making your eyes water a little.

"Awwww," she smiled and sat down, "it cute that you try and find a way out of saying I stink. It ok, my friend a skunk and she say I can rip one almost as bad as she can at times." She held up a key to me. "But, no honey there no other room open. Most are booked for a event that coming up and the one that are left are due for there weekly cleaning up. Even if I could rent them out to you I have a waiting list a mile long as well." She tap her lips as she look me over. "Your just lucky your cute or you be out of luck." She moved closer and let out a small burp. "Just have to get past the smell and you would win a night with a vixen lucky boy." She lifted her bust making her cleavage bigger."

"H-how much do I owe you for the room charge." I asked trying not to faint from lack of oxygen and blood.

"Well call it even ok, I get lonely at night, and your trying to be nice was very cute so it made me smile." She said blowing me a kiss. I ran to the room to one get little fresher air, and two hide the growing tent in my pants. When I made it to her room and look in I saw........
1311.title: 'My room of course', you'll have a smelly night...

choices: For dinner you're having ice cream and milkshakes, which makes Katie super gasay
13112.content:
You enter the room and find that it's incredibly neat and tidy, but unfortunately it also has the stench of her gas. Although the smell overwhelms you, you figure that you may as well get used to it considering you'll have to spend an entire night with her and her eruptions. You wonder how you're going to sleep while all the ruckus occurs right next to you on the bed, and figure you won't. That being said, it beats sleeping outside in the cold, maybe even her gas could warm you up. As you sit down on the bed, you notice to room is actually quite cramped and small. This gives you a feeling of dread as you realize that you'll be trapped in a very small room with her gas. After a few hours, you hear the door open and Katie walks in. "Oh, I forgot you were here, it's a nice suprise to see you!" She exclaims delightedly. You had forgotten how attractive she was and begin blushing a bit. "Yeah, it's nice to see you too" you respond. You hear an audible bubbling coming from Katie's stomach. "Ah, I'm still super gassy. Don't expect me to be holding any of that in by the way" Katie says somewhat sternly, "around here we're open about our gas, we take pride in our natural bodily functions, unlike you humans". This doesn't surprise you in the slightest. Katie notices you glum face. "Aw cheer up, Hun, an experience like this will be beneficial to you. You won't do so well here if you don't get used to us letting loose" she says with a loving smile on her face, followed by a trumpeting FRAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT. A mass of gas similar to what you saw earlier blows out from Katie's rear and spreads out, filling the tight room. "Aaaahhhhhhhhh, that felt nice", the vixen moaned . Katie puts her hands on her hips and looks at you shamelessly. "See, it's not so bad!" she says reassuringly as if there's nothing absolutely disgusting with what she just did right now. You can't believe how okay she is with this, she couldn't possibly expect you to be fine after smelling THAT!

You decide to voice your compliant. "Uhhh, Ms. Ferdinand, I'd appreciate it if you would maybe hold in some of your gas". Katie's face suddenly turns very crossed. "You know it's very rude of you to say that, after I let you stay here for free. Holding in my gas would cause IMMENSE discomfort so I'll freely let it out as I please" she snaps, as she lets out a bassy BRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOMMMMMMMMMPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHTTTT. "Alright, I'm sorry" you apologize, she seems to get very scary when she's mad. Katie begins to calm down. "I guess it is your first time here. But you really should get used to this, because I'm definitely not stopping". This is followed by a bubbly BLLOOOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTT. "It's natural, okay"
13112.title: The room clean but there still that fart smell ...

choices: Your room mate, watching TV on the couch.
Your room mate is waiting for you at the door; Katie must have called up.
1312.content:
You sigh in frustration. "You're sure you don't have any vacant rooms?", you ask.

She shakes her head. "Nope. You really should have booked earlier. The town's pretty busy this time of year, you have to book almost a week in advance to get one of the private rooms. Really, you should be thankful you got a room at all. If it wasn't for a last minute cancellation, you would have had to sleep in your car, or go back to... wherever you came from." She pauses, and looks at you with a slightly puzzled face. "On that topic, why are you here? I don't want to sound rude, but we don't get humans here often. I'd have thought you were here for the convention, but..." she trails off.

"I'm lost. I was hiking for a school project, but I'm pretty far off from anywhere familiar, and I need a place to spend the night."

She seems amused. "You're pretty far off from any park. Still if you're looking for shelter, this is a hell of a lot better then the forest. Now, cash or credit?"

You're about to respond with your card, but your hand freezes when it hits your empty pocket. You've been picked! The color drains from your now penniless face as you turn back to face Katie.

"I, uh, appear to have had my wallet liberated from me."

Katie sighs. "Did you bump into a griffon? Walking on all fours, about seven feet at the shoulder?"

You nod, and she looks at you. "He's a kleptomaniac. If someone stole your wallet, he did. I'll see if I can get it back." She hands you a keycard. "Until then, tonight's on the house."

"Oh. Thank you, Ms. Ferdinand."

"Don't mention it. Look for me in the morning, and I'll probably have it back. I may also be able to give you some info about the town, should you decide to stay for a day or two. First, though, you should probably get some sleep."

You turn to walk away from the desk a moment before you hear Katie let loose a massive, bubbling fart. You can't fathom why she would do that, but this entire town seems just as smelly as her. Maybe it's the water?

You find your room, slide in the keycard, and open the door. A wave of stink hits you, and you suppress your gag reflex again. You see...
1312.title: My friend’s room, he’s a friendly but disgustin...

choices: Skip to the next day, the dragon shows you the festival Katie mentioned
Apparently this dragon has ANOTHER roommate who is a rhino
13123.content:
As you open the door to your room you are quickly enveloped in a sea of red scales that have some kind of sticky sweaty texture to them, yuck. The you hear a male voice yell out, “Hey little buddy.” You are tightly hugged against your dragon roommates red, scaly and blubbery chest and stomach. Your dragon roommate is a pretty overweight and definitely unhygienic dragon man. Shaking, you brush the claws off of your shoulder. "I think I'm going to stay with him." you speak, slowly and deliberately.

You hear the croc scoff, and he plods away. "Whatever, kid. I'll be seeing you, anyways." Regaining your senses you jog to catch the Ox, who is now a block away from you.

"So you're coming with me after all? Good choice" he remarks, turning his head to see you as your approach. You nod, panting and reaching his side. "I gotta ask, though. Why the hell'd a human like you come here, of all places? It's plain to see you hate the smell. You visiting family or somthin'?"

You shake your head. "I'm lost, actually."

"Yeah, clearly," the Ox retorts.

"No, I'm... really lost. I didn't even know this town existed," you explain.

The bovine snorted in surprise. "No shit? Man, you are lost." He shakes his head. "Well, you're out of luck, then. The shuttle to the nearest human city comes Friday night and leaves Saturday morning, so you're stuck here for a week. Unless you want to venture out into the woods and risk getting eaten by wolves, in which case, be my guest," he remarked, extending his hand to the dark grove of trees surrounding the town. You both kept walking down the road.

"Well, I suppose I'll just have to get a room at a hotel and wait it out", you continue. "Where's a good place to stay?"

"Depends. How much do you have?"

"About three hundred, assuming they take Visa-"

"I'll stop you right there. You couldn't rent a bathroom in this place for three hundred." He paused, and scratched his head. "Well, the bathrooms are probably the most expensive places here... but still, that's not enough for the shittiest motel in town."

You balk. "What? Why?"

"Tourism," he replies. "This is the smelliest place on planet Earth, and we're proud of it. Everywhere else in the world, bathrooms are a unpleasant necessity. Here? Not only are toilets optional, but they're well designed, unique, and fun to use. People from all over the world come to experience that. We're a major tourist destination, and priced to match."

"And that's why everyone here smells so bad," you continue, glumly.

"Yep." As if on cue, the Ox's tail flags up and he lets out a long fart, clouding the air with it's smell even as you walk. You reach to pull your shirt up over your nose again, but the Ox stops you.

"That's another thing. You're going to have to get used to the stink." The two of you turn a corner, and continue. "While you're in town, you're going to have to learn to love stink, or grin it and bear it. Not everyone here is as nice as me, and if someone sees you're not a fan of their smell... well, it's never a good idea for someone as small as you to get on someone's bad side here."

You nod, and bring down your shirt. The fat Ox lifts his tail again and grunts, filling the air with his humid stench. You wince, but keep a mostly straight face as you inhale the fumes.

"That's better," he comments. "You'll get used to it, living with me and my roommates for a week." He sees your surprise. "Oh, yeah, I don't live alone. Don't worry, there's nice people and all herbivores, but... even for this town, they crap a lot."

"This is a nice place," you say, looking around the room you've stepped into. From what you can see the house is nicely maintained, well furnished, and, surprisingly, doesn't smell nearly as bad on the inside!

"Thanks," he replies. "The property taxes for a house this size are brutal, but together we bring in quite a bit of money. Do you want a drink?"

Nodding, you step out of your shoes and follow him into a modern kitchen. He pours a soda for you and a beer for himself, and then you both sit at the table, side-by-side.

"You know," you say, nursing your drink, "this place is awfully clean. I thought you said that your roommates were as smelly as you?"

He laughs. "Oh, don't worry, they are. We have a housekeeper come every two weeks, to keep the place from piling up to the point where we can't use it." He looks around, and continues. "Plus, it looks like they're all out, either performing or having fun. Either way, when they come back, you'll smell them before you see them."

You sigh, and turn your attention inwards. A clean house was really too good to be true, but for the moment, you have some relative peace. That is, until you hear a loud fart beside you.

The Ox is bent over and leaning on the table, his tail flagged high, and a relaxed look on his face. "Mmmm..." he murmurs and releases another fart, clouding the air with his pungent smell.

You wave the smell from your face, and suppress a gag. "Come on. Don't you have a bathroom in this house?"

He looks up at you, and smiles. "Actually, yeah, you might want to see it." He stand up, and you follow, somewhat relieved that he's not planning on just pooping on the floor. You walk down a hall, and he enters a door ahead of you. You follow, but you stop in your tracks when you see what's inside.

May wondered whether they were mud when she spotted a pig just pooped into the pit. She shivered at the thought of going in there when they passed through the lane when Tigriss spotted two games.

"Oh, lets play that!" Tigriss pointed. May then followed the gaze as she noticed that Tigriss was pointing at...
15532121111.title: "Oh c'mon, don't be such a spoil sp...

The bell didn't ring. Off to another game!
155321211111.content:
May saw that the diaper was huge, like the size of a double storey house. The leg parts were covered by a cloth to prevent the poop from coming out. There were anthroanimals pooping and peeing into the diaper. May wondered how was that fun? She then saw a sign by the queue.

May went to read it out loud. "The diaper will be filled with all kinds of poop and pee. The unlucky, or lucky, person who gets a bell would be forced to be pushed into it. The top would be covered up by the tapping of the diaper, and he or she would be in the diaper for half a day..." May doesn't like where this was going. She was about to leave when Tigriss grab her hand.

"C'mon! Let's go!" she exclaimed as they queue up. May just sighed, knowing that there was no way out of this. The line wasn't even long, so it end shortly.

"Hey, Tigriss, I don't have to go, do I?" May asked, tapping her fingers together.

"You don't have to if you don't want, but at least try to relief yourself," Tigriss stated, which May just had to go through it then.

It wasn't long when it was Tigriss turn. Luckily there was a room for the person to relief themselves. May heard some plopping sound coming below the said room, which she felt disgusted. It wasn't long when Tigriss came out of the room, feeling relief.

"It's all yours!" she exclaimed, which May gulped before entering the room. It was like an outhouse, but the toilet seat had a giant hole which was covered by the toilet seat. May wondered whether this was a good idea, but she went anyway. She pulled down her skirt before sitting on the toilet seat. The smell around her was stunk of the poop from below her, which she covered her nose from it.

Once she was done, she hoped that the bell didn't ring...
155321211111.title: A Giant Diaper...

1553212111112.content:
May was fortunate that she made it out without falling down into the pit. She exited the room before joining back Tigriss. When she looked back, she heard the bell of someone after her that had fallen down into the pit. She was really close to dropping in the pit if she ever go and defecate.

While they were back at the main route, Tigriss pointed out 2 more games that they could play. May saw where she was pointing to.

- Overstuff Pail
- The Hole

"So, which would you like to go 1st?" Tigriss asked May. She gulped, though not wanting to hurt Tigriss's feeling, she chose...
1553212111112.title: The bell didn't ring. Off to another game!

15532121111121.content:
"The pail," May answered.

Tigriss screamed with glee as she dragged May to the game, not waiting any more time.

When they reached, May noticed that the game was inside a huge mansion, but she could smell something horrible emitting from inside. May began to regret choosing this as they both entered the mansion. They walked up to a desk, with a clerk writing something into a book.

"Excuse me, do you have any room for us to play in?" Tigriss asked, which the clerk looked up with a smile while putting down her pen.

"Yes, we do, and it's the last one as well," the clerk stated.

"Yay! We'll take it!" Tigriss was really excited about it.

"Don't forget, the winner will get a D Suit as well," with that, they headed towards the room, which the clerk gave Tigriss the ticket for it.

"D Suit? What is that?" May asked, finally talking after awhile.

"Well, it's a suit, duh," Tigriss replied before noticing the number on the door. "We're here," with that, she opened the door to the room.

May took a peak into the room, and was regretting about it even more. In the middle of a room, was a giant diaper pail, and it had a height of a 2 storey building. She noticed there were chutes leading into the pail, which would be triggered by someone outside. She saw that there was also a really soaked diaper being hung on the wall, with a pair of bras. "You need to wear them before going in, it's the rules," Tigriss stated as she went to grab a ladder for May to climb into the pail.

May felt disgusted about wearing the soaked diaper, but she can't turn back now since they were here already. "A-alright, I'll wear it," with that, she took the bra and really soaked diaper behind a changing mat, before changing out of her clothes.

When she came out, the feeling of the wet diaper around her waist wasn't pleasant at all. And it was sagging all the way to her knees, even though the band was still at its proper place. "Okay, what now?" May asked, feeling a little chilly since she was just in a diaper and a pair of bra.

"Now, you jump into the pail," Tigriss stated, setting up some things on each of the 5 chutes.

May just sighed as she climb up the ladder to reach the edge of the pail. When she look inside, she saw that there was a small layer of soak diapers at the bottom, which was meant to soften her fall. She gulped about what was going to happen as she closed her eyes and jumped into it. It made a disgusting squelch sound as she felt her entire body covered in pee. "Eww... this is just gross..." May said softly as she tried to stand up.

"Alright, are you ready?" Tigriss asked from outside the pail.

"Y-yeah," May said, not looking forward to this. Inside of the pail, was just like any normal pail. But there was no way for May to climb back up, so in order for her to get out, she needs to wait for the pail to overflow, hence the name of the game. But to get the pail to fill up the whole giant pail, she will have to stack the diapers on top of the other, something which she is not happy to look forward to.

"Alright, here is the 1st one," with that, the sound of something sliding from above caught May's attention. She looked up to see that the chute was spewing...
15532121111121.title: Overstuff Pail

info.brief_description: A village of anthro animals who indulge in gross and smelly behavior.
info.description:
Details:

-In the middle of a forest and right next to a swamp, there is a small town inhabited mostly by anthromorphic animals, refered to here as beastfolk. There are also some mythical creatures here and even a few humans.
-All of the inhabitants of the town stink. They never bathe so they all have a strong odor, especially their feet, armpits, crotch, and behind.
-Scent marking is a common activity in this town. They will do anything from urinating on something, to pooping on it, farting on it, rubbing it on their feet or armpits, slobbering all over it, etc.

Nearby Towns:
-There are a couple of towns near the forest the beastfolks' town resides in.
-One of them is tolerant of everything that goes on there. The population is mostly human but there are a lot of non-humans there. The filthy behavior of the beastfolk is accepted here. Some of the people from there even visit the beastfolk and come back messy and stinky.
-The other town, whose population is completely human, likes to keep things clean and thinks the beastfolk are so disgusting, it's appalling and doesn't want anything to do with them. Some of the beastfolk like to sneak into the town and play pranks on them using their foul smells.

Rules/Guidelines:

1. As you can probably tell, gross smells are the topic of this interactive. Just about anything is allowed; farting, urine, scat, smelly armpits, smelly feet, bad breath, musk, etc.
2. No blood, gore, or character death.
3. Just about anything is allowed as long as it stays focused on the main topic.
4. No short chapters, unless they are choice chapters leading up to something. Otherwise, try to make your entries at least a few sentences long.
EDIT 5. You can use original characters, non-specific characters, or licensed characters (in a limited capacity. Try not to overload the interactive with them).
EDIT 6. No never-ending strings of choice chapters without a chapter with actual content in somewhere.
7. New rules may be added if needed.
